title: Auburn Hills Type ID Please
content:
I’m looking for a Font ID on this Logo. The closest match on the A and H are Black Chancery, but they are not exact. The small text is not Black Chancery though and that is really what I am trying to ID.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103820im_/http:/typophile.com/files/auburn-hills-logo_3513.gif)
  
Thanks for your help!
 [‹ Help with a Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103820/http:/typophile.com/node/50268 "Go to previous forum topic") [want to know this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025103820/http:/typophile.com/node/50600 "Go to next forum topic")
author: maschler

comments.content:
It’s a definite hand job in every sense of the phrase.

Nick Cooke
